DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the frequency of Fabry disease in children with chronic abdominal pain or chronic pain in the extremities
DOC.brief_title: Screening for Fabry Disease in a Pediatric Population at Risk
DOC.criteria: Age below 18 years One of the following criteria: Diagnosis or suspicion of a rheumatological disorder with recurrent complaints for more than 6 months Chronic, recurrent abdominal pain for more than 6 months Planned blood sample for routine diagnostics Written informed consent Patient and/or the patient's parent(s) or legal guardian(s) are unable to understand the nature, scope, and possible consequences of the screening.
